entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
